inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: returned from an international trip few days ago and was living in a camp in Sudan for a month

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Informed consent form signed by the patient's parents or legal guardians

inclusion.criterion: severe sepsis or severe systemic injury
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: The stool is watery and white but the patient has no fever.

inclusion.criterion: severe co-morbidities diseases of the heart
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Blood pressure is 95/62 lying down and drops to 75/40 standing.

exclusion.criterion: simultaneous participation in another clinical study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: consumption of food supplements or medicines containing live micro-organisms or their metabolic products or components during the study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has profuse watery diarrhea without odor, fever is absent. Blood pressure is low and skin turgor has reduced.
